extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 3 or 4 in a PHED Specialization Plan and PACTP01 (or PACT001 or PHED001).

basic.description:
Theory and practice of warm weather camping and canoe tripping. Students spend one pre-term week learning a variety of camping and canoeing skills and application on an extended canoe trip.
NOTE    The Camp School Aquatic Test is also required to register in this course.
basic.subject: PACT
basic.title: Outdoor Education
